properties.entry: SELECT I.USER_NO, I.TEAM_NO, I.USER_ID, I.USER_EMAIL , I.USER_NAME, I.USER_PHONE, I.USER_SNS, I.USER_BD, I.USER_ADDRESS, I.USER_GENDER , I.USER_NATION , I.USER_IMG_ORIGIN , I.USER_IMG_RENAME, I.USER_AUTHORITY , I.USER_ST, TO_CHAR(I.CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM:SS') AS CREATE_DT, TO_CHAR(I.DELETE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MM:SS') AS DELETE_DT, P.AGREE_ADDRESS, P.AGREE_EMAIL, P.AGREE_PHONE FROM USER_INFO I JOIN USER_POLICY P ON (I.USER_NO = P.USER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PW = ?
UPDATE USER_SESSION SET SESSION_UUID = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT USER_ID, USER_PW FROM USER_INFO U JOIN USER_SESSION S ON (U.USER_NO = S.USER_NO) WHERE S.SESSION_UUID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_NO = ? AND USER_PW = ?
